trans-unit.source: The license of the program. This string is displayed in a text view in a secondary dialog, therefore it is fine to use a long multi-paragraph text. Note that the text is only wrapped in the text view if the "wrap-license" property is set to TRUE; otherwise the text itself must contain the intended linebreaks. When setting this property to a non-NULL value, the “license-type” property is set to GTK_LICENSE_CUSTOM as a side effect.
trans-unit.target: 程序的许可证。该字符串显示在辅助对话框的文本视图中，因此可以使用较长的多段文本。请注意，只有将“ wrap-license”属性设置为 TRUE 时，文本才会被包装在文本视图中。否则，文本本身必须包含预期的换行符。将此属性设置为非 NULL 值时， GTK_LICENSE_CUSTOM 是将“ license-type”属性设置为GTK_LICENSE_CUSTOM。

trans-unit.source: The lifecycle of an iterator can be a little confusing at first. Iterators are expected to always be valid for as long as the model is unchanged (and doesn’t emit a signal). The model is considered to own all outstanding iterators and nothing needs to be done to free them from the user’s point of view. Additionally, some models guarantee that an iterator is valid for as long as the node it refers to is valid (most notably the GtkTreeStore and GtkListStore). Although generally uninteresting, as one always has to allow for the case where iterators do not persist beyond a signal, some very important performance enhancements were made in the sort model. As a result, the GTK_TREE_MODEL_ITERS_PERSIST flag was added to indicate this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 首先，迭代器的生命周期可能会有些混乱。只要模型保持不变（并且不发出信号），迭代器就一直有效。该模型被认为拥有所有出色的迭代器，无需执行任何操作即可将其从用户的角度释放。此外，某些模型可确保迭代器在其所指节点有效的时间内有效（最著名的是GtkTreeStore和GtkListStore）。尽管通常没有兴趣，但由于总是必须考虑迭代器不会超出信号范围的情况，因此在排序模型中进行了一些非常重要的性能增强。结果，添加了GTK_TREE_MODEL_ITERS_PERSIST标志以指示此行为。

trans-unit.source: The low-level API consists of the GTK DND API, augmented by some treeview utility functions: gtk_tree_view_set_drag_dest_row(), gtk_tree_view_get_drag_dest_row(), gtk_tree_view_get_dest_row_at_pos(), gtk_tree_view_create_row_drag_icon(), gtk_tree_set_row_drag_data() and gtk_tree_get_row_drag_data(). This API leaves a lot of flexibility, but nothing is done automatically, and implementing advanced features like hover-to-open-rows or autoscrolling on top of this API is a lot of work.
trans-unit.target: 低级API包括GTK DND API，通过一些树状实用功能增强的： gtk_tree_view_set_drag_dest_row() ， gtk_tree_view_get_drag_dest_row() ， gtk_tree_view_get_dest_row_at_pos() ， gtk_tree_view_create_row_drag_icon() ， gtk_tree_set_row_drag_data() 和 gtk_tree_get_row_drag_data() 。该API留有很大的灵活性，但是没有自动完成的功能，并且在此API之上实现高级功能（例如，将鼠标悬停到打开行或自动滚动）需要大量工作。

trans-unit.source: The main columnview node may also carry style classes to select the style of list presentation: .rich-list, .navigation-sidebar or .data-table.
trans-unit.target: 主要的columnview节点还可以包含样式类以选择列表表示的样式：.rich-list，.navigation-sidebar或.data-table。

trans-unit.source: The main difference and one of the primary reasons for this new development is that items can be displayed using regular widgets and GtkCellRenderer is no longer necessary. This allows all benefits that widgets provide, such as complex layout and animating widgets and not only makes cell renderers obsolete, but also GtkCellArea.
trans-unit.target: 这项新开发的主要区别和主要原因之一是可以使用常规窗口小部件显示项目，并且不再需要GtkCellRenderer。这允许了小部件提供的所有好处，例如复杂的布局和动画小部件，不仅使单元格渲染器变得过时，而且使GtkCellArea也变得过时。

trans-unit.source: The main list node may also carry style classes to select the style of list presentation: .rich-list, .navigation-sidebar or .data-table.
trans-unit.target: 主列表节点还可以携带样式类以选择列表表示的样式：.rich-list，.navigation-sidebar或.data-table。

trans-unit.source: The main listview node may also carry style classes to select the style of list presentation: .rich-list, .navigation-sidebar or .data-table.
trans-unit.target: 主listview节点还可以携带样式类以选择列表呈现的样式：.rich-list，.navigation-sidebar或.data-table。

trans-unit.source: The main node gets the .frame style class when the notebook has a border (see gtk_notebook_set_show_border()).
trans-unit.target: 当笔记本有边框时，主节点将获得 .frame 样式类（请参阅 gtk_notebook_set_show_border() ）。

trans-unit.source: The main node gets the style class .fine-tune added when the scale is in 'fine-tuning' mode.
trans-unit.target: 当比例尺处于'微调'模式时,主节点会得到添加的样式类.微调。

trans-unit.source: The main properties of a GtkSpinButton are through an adjustment. See the GtkAdjustment section for more details about an adjustment's properties.
trans-unit.target: GtkSpinButton的主要属性是通过调整。有关调整属性的更多详细信息，请参见GtkAdjustment部分。

trans-unit.source: The main use case for GtkBitset is implementing complex selections for GtkSelectionModel.
trans-unit.target: GtkBitset的主要用例是为GtkSelectionModel实现复杂的选择。

trans-unit.source: The margin property specifies the space which is inserted at the edges of the icon view.
trans-unit.target: 边距属性指定了插入在图标视图边缘的空间。

trans-unit.source: The margins specified in this object are the “print margins”, i.e. the parts of the page that the printer cannot print on. These are different from the layout margins that a word processor uses; they are typically used to determine the minimal size for the layout margins.
trans-unit.target: 在此对象中指定的边距是“打印边距”，即打印机无法在其上打印的页面部分。这些不同于文字处理器使用的布局边距。它们通常用于确定布局边距的最小尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The mark node has a subnode named indicator. If the mark has text, it also has a subnode named label. When the mark is either above or left of the scale, the label subnode is the first when present. Otherwise, the indicator subnode is the first.
trans-unit.target: 标记节点有一个名为指示器的子节点,如果标记有文本,它也有一个名为标签的子节点。如果标记有文字,它也有一个名为标签的子节点。当标记在刻度线的上方或左侧时,如果存在标签子节点,则标签子节点为第一节点,否则,指标子节点为第一节点。否则,指示器子节点为第一个。

trans-unit.source: The markup passed to gtk_label_set_markup() must be valid; for example, literal <, > and & characters must be escaped as <, >, and &. If you pass text obtained from the user, file, or a network to gtk_label_set_markup(), you’ll want to escape it with g_markup_escape_text() or g_markup_printf_escaped().

trans-unit.source: The model interface (GtkTreeModel)
trans-unit.target: 模型接口(GtkTreeModel)

trans-unit.source: The model is represented as a hierarchical tree of strongly-typed, columned data. In other words, the model can be seen as a tree where every node has different values depending on which column is being queried. The type of data found in a column is determined by using the GType system (ie. G_TYPE_INT, GTK_TYPE_BUTTON, G_TYPE_POINTER, etc). The types are homogeneous per column across all nodes. It is important to note that this interface only provides a way of examining a model and observing changes. The implementation of each individual model decides how and if changes are made.
trans-unit.target: 该模型是由强类型、列式数据组成的分层树表示的。换句话说,该模型可以被看作是一棵树,其中每个节点都有不同的值,这取决于被查询的列。在列中发现的数据类型是通过使用GType系统(即G_TYPE_INT、GTK_TYPE_BUTTON、G_TYPE_POINTER等)来确定的。在所有节点中,每列的类型是同质的。需要注意的是,这个接口只是提供了一种检查模型和观察变化的方法。每个单独模型的实现决定了如何以及是否进行更改。

trans-unit.source: The model should only contain submenus as toplevel elements.
trans-unit.target: 该模型应该只包含子菜单作为toplevel元素。

trans-unit.source: The model will use a sorter to determine the order in which its items should appear by calling gtk_sorter_compare() for pairs of items.
trans-unit.target: 该模型将使用排序器，通过为成对的项目调用 gtk_sorter_compare() 来确定其项目应出现的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The model will use the filter to determine if it should include items or not by calling gtk_filter_match() for each item and only keeping the ones that the function returns TRUE for.
trans-unit.target: 模型将使用过滤器来确定是否应包含项目，方法是为每个项目调用 gtk_filter_match() 并仅保留函数为 TRUE 返回的项目。

trans-unit.source: The model.
trans-unit.target: 该模型。

trans-unit.source: The modifier mask determines which modifiers are considered significant for keyboard accelerators. This includes all keyboard modifiers except for GDK_LOCK_MASK.
trans-unit.target: 修饰符掩码确定哪些修饰符对于键盘加速器而言是重要的。这包括除 GDK_LOCK_MASK 之外的所有键盘修改器。

trans-unit.source: The modifier mask of the accelerator.
trans-unit.target: 加速器的修改器掩码。

trans-unit.source: The modifiers that need to be pressed to allow mnemonics activation.
trans-unit.target: 需要按下的修饰符,才可以激活记忆符。

trans-unit.source: The most basic input devices that every computer user has interacted with are keyboards and mice; beyond these, GTK supports touchpads, touchscreens and more exotic input devices such as graphics tablets. Inside GTK, every such input device is represented by a GdkDevice object.
trans-unit.target: 每个计算机用户都已与之交互的最基本的输入设备是键盘和鼠标。除此之外，GTK还支持触摸板，触摸屏和图形输入板等更奇特的输入设备。在GTK内部，每个此类输入设备均由GdkDevice对象表示。

trans-unit.source: The most basic way to use a GtkDropTarget to receive drops on a widget is to create it via gtk_drop_target_new() passing in the GType of the data you want to receive and connect to the GtkDropTarget::drop signal to receive the data.
trans-unit.target: 使用GtkDropTarget接收小部件上的放置的最基本方法是通过 gtk_drop_target_new() 传入要接收的数据的GType来创建它，并连接到GtkDropTarget :: drop信号以接收数据。

trans-unit.source: The most likely place where you will encounter expressions is in the context of list models and list widgets using them. For example, GtkDropDown is evaluating a GtkExpression to obtain strings from the items in its model that it can then use to match against the contents of its search entry. GtkStringFilter is using a GtkExpression for similar reasons.
trans-unit.target: 您最可能遇到表达式的地方是在列表模型和使用它们的列表小部件的上下文中。例如，GtkDropDown正在评估GtkExpression以从其模型中的项目获取字符串，然后可以将其用于与其搜索条目的内容进行匹配。出于类似的原因，GtkStringFilter正在使用GtkExpression。

trans-unit.source: The most likely scenario for implementing GtkEditable on your own widget is that you will embed a GtkText inside a complex widget, and want to delegate the editable functionality to that text widget. GtkEditable provides some utility functions to make this easy.
trans-unit.target: 在自己的窗口小部件上实现GtkEditable的最可能方案是，您将在复杂的窗口小部件中嵌入GtkText，并希望将可编辑功能委托给该文本窗口小部件。GtkEditable提供了一些实用程序功能来简化此操作。

trans-unit.source: The older deprecation mechanism of hiding deprecated interfaces entirely from the compiler by using the preprocessor symbol GTK_DISABLE_DEPRECATED is still used for deprecated macros, enumeration values, etc. To detect uses of these in your code, use the commandline option -DGTK_DISABLE_DEPRECATED. There are similar symbols GDK_DISABLE_DEPRECATED, GDK_PIXBUF_DISABLE_DEPRECATED and G_DISABLE_DEPRECATED for GDK, GdkPixbuf and GLib.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用预处理器符号GTK_DISABLE_DEPRECATED从编译器完全隐藏已弃用的接口的较旧的弃用机制仍用于已弃用的宏，枚举值等。要在代码中检测到它们的使用，请使用命令行选项 -DGTK_DISABLE_DEPRECATED 。对于GDK，GdkPixbuf和GLib，有类似的符号GDK_DISABLE_DEPRECATED，GDK_PIXBUF_DISABLE_DEPRECATED和G_DISABLE_DEPRECATED。

trans-unit.source: The options are given to GtkDropDown in the form of GListModel, and how the individual options are represented is determined by a GtkListItemFactory. The default factory displays simple strings.

trans-unit.source: The other big difference is the massive change to the data model. GtkTreeModel was a rather complex interface for a tree data structure and GListModel was deliberately designed to be a simple data structure for lists only. (See above) for how to still do trees with this new model.) Another big change is that the new model allows for bulk changes via the “items-changed” signal while GtkTreeModel only allows a single item to change at once. The goal here is of course to encourage implementation of custom list models.
trans-unit.target: 另一个很大的不同是数据模型的巨大变化。GtkTreeModel是用于树数据结构的相当复杂的接口，而GListModel则被故意设计为仅用于列表的简单数据结构。（请参见上文），以了解如何仍然使用该新模型来制作树。）另一个重大变化是，新模型允许通过“ items-changed”信号进行批量更改，而GtkTreeModel仅允许一次更改单个项目。当然，这里的目标是鼓励自定义列表模型的实现。

trans-unit.source: The other important part of a view is a factory. Each factory is a GtkListItemFactory implementation that takes care of mapping the items of the model to widgets that can be shown in the view.
trans-unit.target: 视图的另一个重要部分是工厂。每个工厂都是一个GtkListItemFactory实现，该实现负责将模型的项目映射到可以在视图中显示的小部件。

trans-unit.source: The output of this function is guaranteed to be the same for a given value only per-process. It may change between different processor architectures or even different versions of GTK. Do not use this function as a basis for building protocols or file formats.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数的输出只保证每个进程的给定值相同。它可能会在不同的处理器架构甚至不同版本的GTK之间发生变化,请不要使用此函数作为构建协议或文件格式的基础。不要用这个函数作为构建协议或文件格式的基础。

trans-unit.source: The parser is fairly liberal and allows lower or upper case, and also abbreviations such as “<Ctl>” and “<Ctrl>”. Key names are parsed using gdk_keyval_from_name(). For character keys the name is not the symbol, but the lowercase name, e.g. one would use “<Ctrl>minus” instead of “<Ctrl>-”.
trans-unit.target: 解析器相当自由，可以使用小写或大写形式，也可以使用缩写，例如“ <Ctl>”和“ <Ctrl>”。密钥名称使用 gdk_keyval_from_name() 进行解析。对于字符键，名称不是符号，而是小写名称，例如，将使用“ <Ctrl>减号”而不是“ <Ctrl>-”。

trans-unit.source: The policy determines when the scrollbar should appear; it is a value from the GtkPolicyType enumeration. If GTK_POLICY_ALWAYS, the scrollbar is always present; if GTK_POLICY_NEVER, the scrollbar is never present; if GTK_POLICY_AUTOMATIC, the scrollbar is present only if needed (that is, if the slider part of the bar would be smaller than the trough — the display is larger than the page size).
trans-unit.target: 该策略确定滚动条应在何时出现。它是GtkPolicyType枚举的值。如果 GTK_POLICY_ALWAYS ，则滚动条将始终存在；否则，滚动条将始终存在。如果 GTK_POLICY_NEVER ，则滚动条从不存在；如果 GTK_POLICY_AUTOMATIC ，则仅在需要时才显示滚动条（即，如果条的滑块部分小于谷底—显示大于页面大小）。

trans-unit.source: The preview application is responsible for removing the pdf file and the print settings file when it is done.

trans-unit.source: The primary intended audience is bindings that want to provide deeper integration of GtkBuilder into the language.
trans-unit.target: 主要的目标读者是想要将GtkBuilder与该语言进行更深入集成的绑定。

trans-unit.source: The primary text of the message dialog. If the dialog has a secondary text, this will appear as the title.
trans-unit.target: 信息对话框的主要文本。如果对话框有次要文本,将作为标题出现。

trans-unit.source: The primary use of a GtkCellRenderer is for drawing a certain graphical elements on a cairo_t. Typically, one cell renderer is used to draw many cells on the screen. To this extent, it isn’t expected that a CellRenderer keep any permanent state around. Instead, any state is set just prior to use using GObjects property system. Then, the cell is measured using gtk_cell_renderer_get_preferred_size(). Finally, the cell is rendered in the correct location using gtk_cell_renderer_snapshot().
trans-unit.target: 一的主要用途GtkCellRenderer是借鉴了一定的图形元素cairo_t。通常，一个单元格渲染器用于在屏幕上绘制许多单元格。在这种程度上，不希望CellRenderer保持任何永久状态。而是可以在使用GObjects属性系统之前设置任何状态。然后，使用 gtk_cell_renderer_get_preferred_size() 测量该单元格。最后，使用 gtk_cell_renderer_snapshot() 将单元格渲染到正确的位置。

trans-unit.source: The print dialog owns the returned widget, and its lifetime is not controlled by the application. However, the widget is guaranteed to stay around until the “custom-widget-apply” signal is emitted on the operation. Then you can read out any information you need from the widgets.
trans-unit.target: 打印对话框拥有返回的窗口小部件，并且其生存期不受应用程序控制。但是，在操作上发出“ custom-widget-apply”（自定义小部件应用）信号之前，必须保证小部件会停留在周围。然后，您可以从小部件中读出所需的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: The print job has been sent to the printer, but is not printed for some reason, e.g. the printer may be stopped.
trans-unit.target: 打印作业已被发送到打印机,但由于某些原因没有打印出来,例如打印机可能已经停止。

trans-unit.source: The print job is being sent off to the printer.

trans-unit.target: 打印操作已被取消,打印设置不应保存。

trans-unit.source: The print operation is not complete yet. This value will only be returned when running asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 打印操作尚未完成。只有在异步运行时才会返回该值。

trans-unit.source: The print settings should be stored.
trans-unit.target: 应存储打印设置。

trans-unit.source: The printer is processing the print job.
trans-unit.target: 打印机正在处理打印作业。

trans-unit.source: The printing has been aborted.
trans-unit.target: 打印已被中止。

trans-unit.source: The printing has been completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 打印已经成功完成。

trans-unit.source: The printing has not started yet; this status is set initially, and while the print dialog is shown.
trans-unit.target: 打印尚未开始;该状态在最初设置时,以及在打印对话框显示时设置。

trans-unit.source: The priority at which the text view validates onscreen lines in an idle job in the background.

trans-unit.source: The program name. The string is owned by the about dialog and must not be modified.
trans-unit.target: 程序名称。该字符串由关于对话框拥有,不得修改。

trans-unit.source: The program will send the document to the printer in PDF format

trans-unit.source: The program will send the document to the printer in Postscript format
trans-unit.target: 该程序将以Postscript格式向打印机发送文件。

trans-unit.source: The propagation phase at which this controller will handle events.
trans-unit.target: 该控制器处理事件的传播阶段。

trans-unit.source: The property determines whether the “row-activated” signal will be emitted for this row.

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the cell renderers is to provide extensibility to the widget and to allow multiple ways of rendering the same type of data. For example, consider how to render a boolean variable. Should it render it as a string of “True” or “False”, “On” or “Off”, or should it be rendered as a checkbox?
trans-unit.target: 单元格渲染器的目的是为窗口小部件提供可扩展性，并允许多种方式渲染同一类型的数据。例如，考虑如何呈现布尔变量。它应将其呈现为“ True”或“ False”，“ On”或“ Off”字符串，还是应将其呈现为复选框？

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this text field.
trans-unit.target: 这个文本领域的目的。

trans-unit.source: The queried attributes.
trans-unit.target: 查询的属性。

trans-unit.source: The range node gets the style class .fine-tune added when the scrollbar is in 'fine-tuning' mode.
trans-unit.target: 当滚动条处于 "微调 "模式时,范围节点会得到添加的样式类.微调。

trans-unit.source: The range of the spinbutton is taken from the adjustment property of the cell renderer, which can be set explicitly or mapped to a column in the tree model, like all properties of cell renders. GtkCellRendererSpin also has properties for the “climb-rate” and the number of “digits” to display. Other GtkSpinButton properties can be set in a handler for the “editing-started” signal.
trans-unit.target: 旋转按钮的范围取自单元格渲染器的调整属性，可以像单元格渲染的所有属性一样，将其显式设置或映射到树模型中的列。GtkCellRendererSpin还具有“爬升率”和要显示的“位数”的属性。可以在处理程序中为“开始编辑”信号设置其他GtkSpinButton属性。

trans-unit.source: The raw text from the file chooser’s “Name” entry. Free this with g_free(). Note that this string is not a full pathname or URI; it is whatever the contents of the entry are. Note also that this string is in UTF-8 encoding, which is not necessarily the system’s encoding for filenames.
trans-unit.target: 来自文件选择器“名称”条目的原始文本。使用 g_free() 释放它。请注意，该字符串不是完整的路径名或URI。无论条目的内容是什么。还要注意，该字符串采用UTF-8编码，不一定是系统对文件名的编码。

trans-unit.source: The recently used files list is per user.
trans-unit.target: 最近使用过的文件列表是每个用户的。

trans-unit.source: The recommended way to construct a GtkShortcutsWindow is with GtkBuilder, by populating a GtkShortcutsWindow with one or more GtkShortcutsSection objects, which contain GtkShortcutsGroups that in turn contain objects of class GtkShortcutsShortcut.
trans-unit.target: 构建GtkShortcutsWindow推荐的方法是用GtkBuilder，通过填充一个GtkShortcutsWindow与一种或多种GtkShortcutsSection对象，它们包含GtkShortcutsGroups其又包含类的对象GtkShortcutsShortcut。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle position is in buffer coordinates; use gtk_text_view_buffer_to_window_coords() to convert these coordinates to coordinates for one of the windows in the text view.
trans-unit.target: 矩形位置在缓冲区坐标中；使用 gtk_text_view_buffer_to_window_coords() 将这些坐标转换为文本视图中窗口之一的坐标。

trans-unit.source: The relation between two terms of a constraint.
trans-unit.target: 一个约束条件的两个条款之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: The rem unit is resolved using the initial font size value, which is not quite the same as the CSS definition of rem.
trans-unit.target: rem单元是用初始字体大小值来解析的,这和CSS定义的rem不太一样。

trans-unit.source: The remainder of extra_space after redistributing space to sizes .
trans-unit.target: 的其余 extra_space 重新分配空间后 sizes 。

trans-unit.source: The remaining space will be added to the minimum_size member of the GtkRequestedSize struct. If all sizes reach their natural size then the remaining space is returned.
trans-unit.target: 剩余空间将添加到GtkRequestedSize结构的 minimum_size 成员中。如果所有大小均达到其自然大小，则返回剩余空间。

trans-unit.source: The reorderable property specifies if the items can be reordered by DND.
trans-unit.target: 可重新排序属性指定了项目是否可以被DND重新排序。

trans-unit.source: The representation being used for image data.
trans-unit.target: 用于图像数据的表示方法。

trans-unit.source: The representation which is used for the primary icon of the entry.
trans-unit.target: 用来表示条目的主要图标。

trans-unit.source: The representation which is used for the secondary icon of the entry.
trans-unit.target: 用来表示条目的次要图标。

trans-unit.source: The requested opacity of the widget. See gtk_widget_set_opacity() for more details about window opacity.
trans-unit.target: 请求的窗口小部件的不透明度。有关窗口不透明度的更多详细信息，请参见 gtk_widget_set_opacity() 。

trans-unit.source: The resources are considered as part of the hicolor icon theme and must be located in subdirectories that are defined in the hicolor icon theme, such as @path/16x16/actions/run.png or @path/scalable/actions/run.svg.
trans-unit.target: 资源被视为hicolor图标主题的一部分，并且必须位于hicolor图标主题中定义的子目录中，例如 @path/16x16/actions/run.png 或 @path/scalable/actions/run.svg 。

trans-unit.source: The resources are considered as part of the hicolor icon theme and must be located in subdirectories that are defined in the hicolor icon theme, such as @path/16x16/actions/run.png. Icons that are directly placed in the resource path instead of a subdirectory are also considered as ultimate fallback.
trans-unit.target: 资源被视为hicolor图标主题的一部分，并且必须位于hicolor图标主题中定义的子目录中，例如 @path/16x16/actions/run.png 。直接放置在资源路径而不是子目录中的图标也被视为最终的后备。

trans-unit.source: The rest of the code in example-1.c is identical to example-0.c. The next section will elaborate further on how to add several GtkWidgets to your GTK application.
trans-unit.target: 在代码的其余部分 example-1.c 是相同的 example-0.c 。下一节将进一步详细说明如何向您的GTK应用程序中添加几个GtkWidget。

trans-unit.source: The restrict-to-fill-level property controls whether slider movement is restricted to an upper boundary set by the fill level. See gtk_range_set_restrict_to_fill_level().
trans-unit.target: 限制于填充水平属性控制滑块移动是否限制在由填充水平设置的上限。请参阅 gtk_range_set_restrict_to_fill_level() 。

trans-unit.source: The return value indicates whether there is a tree view row at the given coordinates (TRUE) or not (FALSE) for mouse tooltips. For keyboard tooltips the row returned will be the cursor row. When TRUE, then any of model , path and iter which have been provided will be set to point to that row and the corresponding model. x and y will always be converted to be relative to tree_view ’s bin_window if keyboard_tooltip is FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 返回值指示鼠标工具提示在给定坐标处是否存在树视图行（ TRUE ）（ FALSE ）。对于键盘工具提示，返回的行将是光标行。如果为 TRUE ，那么将提供的 model ， path 和 iter 中的任何一个都设置为指向该行和相应的模型。如果 keyboard_tooltip 为 FALSE ,则 x 和 y 将始终转换为相对于 tree_view 的bin_window 。

trans-unit.source: The return value indicates whether there is an icon view item at the given coordinates (TRUE) or not (FALSE) for mouse tooltips. For keyboard tooltips the item returned will be the cursor item. When TRUE, then any of model , path and iter which have been provided will be set to point to that row and the corresponding model.
trans-unit.target: 返回值指示鼠标工具提示在给定坐标处是否存在图标查看项（ TRUE ）（ FALSE ）。对于键盘工具提示，返回的项目将是光标项目。如果为 TRUE ，那么将提供的 model ， path 和 iter 中的任何一个都设置为指向该行和相应的模型。

trans-unit.source: The returned GtkTreePath must be freed with gtk_tree_path_free() when you are done with it.
trans-unit.target: 完成后，必须使用 gtk_tree_path_free() 释放返回的GtkTreePath。

trans-unit.source: The returned GtkTreePath must be freed with gtk_tree_path_free().
trans-unit.target: 返回的GtkTreePath必须使用 gtk_tree_path_free() 释放。

trans-unit.source: The returned GPtrArray is an array of strings where the last item is the currently open tag (as would be returned by gtk_buildable_parse_context_get_element()) and the previous item is its immediate parent.
trans-unit.target: 返回的GPtrArray是一个字符串数组，其中最后一项是当前打开的标记（如 gtk_buildable_parse_context_get_element() 返回），而上一项是其直接父项。

trans-unit.source: The returned items must conform to the item type of the model they are used with.
trans-unit.target: 退回的物品必须符合其使用的型号的物品类型。

trans-unit.source: The returned object should not be modified. It may or may not be updated for later changes.
trans-unit.target: 返回的对象不应该被修改。它可能会被更新,也可能不会被更新以适应以后的变化。

trans-unit.source: The returned path must be freed with gtk_tree_path_free().
trans-unit.target: 返回的路径必须使用 gtk_tree_path_free() 释放。

trans-unit.source: The returned string is owned by GTK and should not be modified. It is only valid until the next call to gtk_window_set_default_icon_name().
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串由GTK拥有，因此不应进行修改。它仅在下一次调用 gtk_window_set_default_icon_name() 之前有效。

trans-unit.source: The returned value is an interned string which means that you can compare the pointer by value to other interned strings and that you must not free it.
trans-unit.target: 返回的值是一个被实习的字符串,这意味着你可以通过值与其他被实习的字符串进行比较,你不能释放它。

trans-unit.source: The right edge of a widget, regardless of text direction
trans-unit.target: 小组件的右边缘,与文本方向无关。

trans-unit.source: The role cannot be changed after instantiating a GtkAccessible implementation.
trans-unit.target: 实例化GtkAccessible实现后，无法更改角色。

trans-unit.source: The root model displayed
trans-unit.target: 显示的根模型

trans-unit.source: The rotation axis
trans-unit.target: 旋转轴

trans-unit.source: The row in which the item is displayed
trans-unit.target: 显示项目的行

trans-unit.source: The row item.

trans-unit.source: The row object can be used to expand and collapse rows as well as to inspect its position in the tree. See its documentation for details.
trans-unit.target: 行对象可以用来展开和折叠行,以及检查它在树中的位置。详情请看其文档。

trans-unit.source: The row to align the to the baseline when valign is GTK_ALIGN_BASELINE.
trans-unit.target: 当valign为GTK_ALIGN_BASELINE时,要对齐到基线的行。

trans-unit.source: The row to align to the baseline, when “valign” is set to GTK_ALIGN_BASELINE.

trans-unit.source: The row to place the child in.
trans-unit.target: 要把孩子放在哪一行。

trans-unit.source: The row to select or NULL.
trans-unit.target: 要选择的行或 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: The row will also be unhighlighted when the widget gets a drag leave event.
trans-unit.target: 当小组件得到一个拖动离开事件时,该行也将被取消高亮。

trans-unit.source: The row-spacing property specifies the space which is inserted between the rows of the icon view.
trans-unit.target: 行距属性指定了插入到图标视图行之间的空间。

trans-unit.source: The same model can be used in multiple different views and wrapped with multiple different models at once.
trans-unit.target: 同一个模型可以在多个不同的视图中使用,并同时包装多个不同的模型。

trans-unit.source: The scale factor of the widget. See gtk_widget_get_scale_factor() for more details about widget scaling.
trans-unit.target: 小部件的比例因子。有关小部件缩放的更多详细信息，请参见 gtk_widget_get_scale_factor() 。

trans-unit.target: 场景图

trans-unit.source: The scope allows shortcuts to be activated outside of the normal event propagation. In particular, it allows installing global keyboard shortcuts that can be activated even when a widget does not have focus.
trans-unit.target: 该范围允许在正常事件传播之外激活快捷键。特别是,它允许安装全局键盘快捷键,即使小组件没有焦点时也可以激活。

trans-unit.source: The scope the builder is operating in
trans-unit.target: 施工方的经营范围

trans-unit.source: The scope used when constructing listitems.

trans-unit.source: The scrollbar is always visible. The view size is independent of the content.
trans-unit.target: 滚动条始终可见。视图大小与内容无关。

trans-unit.source: The scrollbar should never appear. In this mode the content determines the size.
trans-unit.target: 滚动条不应该出现。在这种模式下,内容决定了滚动条的大小。

trans-unit.source: The scrollbar will appear and disappear as necessary. For example, when all of a GtkTreeView can not be seen.
trans-unit.target: 滚动条将根据需要出现和消失。例如，当所有GtkTreeView都看不到时。

trans-unit.source: The search path for this icon theme.
trans-unit.target: 这个图标主题的搜索路径。

trans-unit.source: The search string and text must match exactly.
trans-unit.target: 搜索字符串和文本必须完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: The search string must be contained as a substring inside the text.
trans-unit.target: 搜索字符串必须以子串形式包含在文本中。

trans-unit.target: 搜索字符串。

trans-unit.source: The search term
trans-unit.target: 搜索词

trans-unit.source: The second child.
trans-unit.target: 第二个孩子。

trans-unit.source: The secondary text of the message dialog.

trans-unit.source: The selected date can be retrieved from a GtkCalendar using gtk_calendar_get_date().
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 gtk_calendar_get_date() 从GtkCalendar中检索所选日期。

trans-unit.source: The selected day (as a number between 1 and 31, or 0 to unselect the currently selected day). This property gets initially set to the current day.
trans-unit.target: 选定的日期(1到31之间的数字,或0表示取消选择当前选定的日期)。此属性初始设置为当前日期。

trans-unit.target: 所选项目

trans-unit.source: The selection handling is also different. While selections used to be managed via custom code in each widget, selection state is now meant to be managed by the selection models. In particular this allows for complex use cases with specialized requirements.
trans-unit.target: 选择处理也不同。过去,选择是通过每个小组件中的自定义代码来管理的,而现在,选择状态是由选择模型来管理的。特别是这允许有特殊要求的复杂用例。

trans-unit.source: The settings “gtk-shell-shows-app-menu” and “gtk-shell-shows-menubar” tell GTK+ whether the desktop environment is showing the application menu and menubar models outside the application as part of the desktop shell. For instance, on OS X, both menus will be displayed remotely; on Windows neither will be. gnome-shell (starting with version 3.4) will display the application menu, but not the menubar.
trans-unit.target: 设置“ gtk-shell-shows-app-menu”和“ gtk-shell-shows-menubar”告诉GTK +桌面环境是否将应用程序菜单和菜单栏模型作为桌面Shell的一部分显示在应用程序外部。例如，在OS X上，两个菜单都将远程显示。在Windows上都不会。gnome-shell（从3.4版开始）将显示应用程序菜单，但不显示菜单栏。

trans-unit.source: The size request of a GtkFlowBox alone may not be what you expect; if you need to be able to shrink it along both axes and dynamically reflow its children, you may have to wrap it in a GtkScrolledWindow to enable that.
trans-unit.target: 仅GtkFlowBox的大小要求可能不是您期望的；如果您需要能够沿两个轴缩小它并动态重排其子级，则可能必须将其包装在GtkScrolledWindow中才能启用它。

trans-unit.source: The size request of a widget is the smallest size a widget can accept while still functioning well and drawing itself correctly. However in some strange cases a widget may be allocated less than its requested size, and in many cases a widget may be allocated more space than it requested.
trans-unit.target: 小组件的尺寸请求是小组件可以接受的最小尺寸,同时仍可正常运行并正确绘制。然而,在一些奇怪的情况下,小组件所分配的尺寸可能会少于其请求的尺寸,在许多情况下,小组件所分配的空间可能会超过其请求的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The size request set here does not include any margin from the GtkWidget properties margin-left, margin-right, margin-top, and margin-bottom, but it does include pretty much all other padding or border properties set by any subclass of GtkWidget.
trans-unit.target: 此处设置的大小请求不包括GtkWidget属性margin-left，margin-right，margin-top和margin-bottom的任何边距，但实际上包含了GtkWidget的任何子类设置的几乎所有其他填充或边框属性。

trans-unit.source: The sizing method the column uses to determine its width. Please note that GTK_TREE_VIEW_COLUMN_AUTOSIZE are inefficient for large views, and can make columns appear choppy.
trans-unit.target: 列用来确定其宽度的大小确定方法。请注意， GTK_TREE_VIEW_COLUMN_AUTOSIZE 对于大视图而言效率不高，并且会使列显得不连贯。

trans-unit.source: The smallest possible value for the position property. This property is derived from the size and shrinkability of the widget's children.
trans-unit.target: 位置属性的最小值。此属性来自小组件子代的大小和可收缩性。

trans-unit.source: The smallest value in self
trans-unit.target: self 最小值

trans-unit.source: The snapshot_layer vfunc is called before and after the text view is drawing its own text. Applications can override this vfunc in a subclass to draw customized content underneath or above the text. In the GTK_TEXT_VIEW_LAYER_BELOW_TEXT and GTK_TEXT_VIEW_LAYER_ABOVE_TEXT layers the drawing is done in the buffer coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 在文本视图绘制自己的文本之前和之后，将调用snapshot_layer vfunc。应用程序可以在子类中覆盖此vfunc，以在文本下方或上方绘制自定义内容。在 GTK_TEXT_VIEW_LAYER_BELOW_TEXT 和 GTK_TEXT_VIEW_LAYER_ABOVE_TEXT 图层中，绘制是在缓冲区坐标空间中完成的。

trans-unit.source: The sort column id to be filled in.
trans-unit.target: 要填写的排序列id。

trans-unit.source: The sort indicator changes direction to indicate normal sort or reverse sort. Note that you must have the sort indicator enabled to see anything when calling this function; see gtk_tree_view_column_set_sort_indicator().
trans-unit.target: 排序指示器更改方向以指示正常排序或反向排序。请注意，调用此函数时，必须启用排序指示器才能看到任何内容。参见 gtk_tree_view_column_set_sort_indicator() 。

trans-unit.source: The sort order of the column
trans-unit.target: 列的排序顺序

trans-unit.source: The sort order was inverted. Comparisons that returned GTK_ORDERING_SMALLER now return GTK_ORDERING_LARGER and vice versa. Other comparisons return the same values as before.
trans-unit.target: 排序顺序颠倒了。返回 GTK_ORDERING_SMALLER 的比较现在返回 GTK_ORDERING_LARGER ，反之亦然。其他比较返回与以前相同的值。

trans-unit.source: The sorter change cannot be described by any of the other enumeration values
trans-unit.target: 分拣机的变化不能用任何其他枚举值来描述。

trans-unit.source: The sorter for this model
trans-unit.target: 本型号的分拣机

trans-unit.source: The sorter is less strict: Comparisons may now return GTK_ORDERING_EQUAL that did not do so before.
trans-unit.target: 排序器不太严格：现在比较可能会返回 GTK_ORDERING_EQUAL ，而以前没有这样做。

trans-unit.source: The sorter is more strict: Comparisons that did return GTK_ORDERING_EQUAL may not do so anymore.
trans-unit.target: 排序器更加严格：确实返回 GTK_ORDERING_EQUAL 的比较可能不再这样做。

trans-unit.source: The sorter may signal it conforms to additional constraints via the return value of gtk_sorter_get_order().
trans-unit.target: 排序器可以通过 gtk_sorter_get_order() 的返回值来表示其符合其他约束。

trans-unit.source: The sorter to use, or NULL.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的排序器，或 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: The source and target widgets, as well as their attributes, of a GtkConstraint instance are immutable after creation.
trans-unit.target: 创建后，GtkConstraint实例的源和目标小部件及其属性是不可变的。

trans-unit.target: 间距属性指定了项目的单元格(即图标和文本)之间插入的空间。

trans-unit.source: The special value all can be used to turn on all debug options. The special value help can be used to obtain a list of all supported debug options.
trans-unit.target: 特殊值 all 可用于打开所有调试选项。特殊值 help 可用于获取所有受支持的调试选项的列表。

trans-unit.source: The specified icon name is used to look up a themed icon, while taking into account the values of the -gtk-icon-palette property. This kind of image is mainly used as value of the -gtk-icon-source property.
trans-unit.target: 指定的图标名称用于查找主题图标,同时考虑到-gtk-icon-palette属性的值。这种图片主要是作为-gtk-icon-source属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The specified property is unknown for the object class.
trans-unit.target: 指定的属性对对象类来说是未知的。

trans-unit.target: 指定的信号对于对象类来说是未知的。

trans-unit.source: The spin button update policy determines whether the spin button displays values even if they are outside the bounds of its adjustment. See gtk_spin_button_set_update_policy().
trans-unit.target: 旋转按钮更新策略确定旋转按钮是否显示值，即使它们不在其调整范围之内。请参阅 gtk_spin_button_set_update_policy() 。

trans-unit.source: The stack switcher gets all its information it needs to display tabs from the stack that it belongs to. Here, we are passing the label to show for each file as the last argument to the gtk_stack_add_titled() function.
trans-unit.target: 堆栈切换器从其所属的堆栈中获取显示其选项卡所需的所有信息。在这里，我们传递标签以显示每个文件，作为 gtk_stack_add_titled() 函数的最后一个参数。

trans-unit.target: 标准无障碍界面

trans-unit.source: The start and end attributes specify the range of characters to which the Pango attribute applies. If start and end are not specified, the attribute is applied to the whole text. Note that specifying ranges does not make much sense with translatable attributes. Use markup embedded in the translatable content instead.
trans-unit.target: 开始和结束属性指定了Pango属性所适用的字符范围。如果没有指定开始和结束,则会将属性应用于整个文本。请注意,指定范围对可翻译属性没有多大意义。请使用嵌入在可翻译内容中的标记来代替。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of this property is (an extension of) the syntax understood by gtk_accelerator_parse(). Multiple accelerators can be specified by separating them with a space, but keep in mind that the available width is limited. It is also possible to specify ranges of shortcuts, using ... between the keys. Sequences of keys can be specified using a + or & between the keys.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的语法是 gtk_accelerator_parse() 理解的语法（的扩展）。可以通过用空格分隔多个加速器来指定它们，但请注意，可用宽度是有限的。也可以使用键之间的...指定快捷方式的范围。可以使用键之间的+或＆来指定键的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The tab widget for this page.
trans-unit.target: 本页的标签小部件。

trans-unit.source: The table must be sorted in dictionary order on the numeric value of the key symbol fields. (Values beyond the length of the sequence should be zero.)

trans-unit.source: The target value has two purposes. First, it is used as the parameter to activation of the action associated with the GtkActionable widget. Second, it is used to determine if the widget should be rendered as “active” — the widget is active if the state is equal to the given target.
trans-unit.target: 目标值有两个目的。首先，它用作激活与GtkActionable小部件关联的动作的参数。其次，它用于确定是否应将小部件呈现为“活动” —如果状态等于给定目标，则该小部件为活动状态。

trans-unit.source: The target widget will be accelerated by emitting the GtkWidget::mnemonic-activate signal on it. The default handler for this signal will activate the widget if there are no mnemonic collisions and toggle focus between the colliding widgets otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 目标小组件将通过发出 GtkWidget::mnemonic-activate 信号来加速。该信号的默认处理程序将在没有记忆符碰撞的情况下激活小组件,否则将在碰撞的小组件之间切换焦点。

trans-unit.source: The toplevel element is <interface>. It optionally takes a “domain” attribute, which will make the builder look for translated strings using dgettext() in the domain specified. This can also be done by calling gtk_builder_set_translation_domain() on the builder. Objects are described by <object> elements, which can contain <property> elements to set properties, <signal> elements which connect signals to handlers, and <child> elements, which describe child objects (most often widgets inside a container, but also e.g. actions in an action group, or columns in a tree model). A <child> element contains an <object> element which describes the child object. The target toolkit version(s) are described by <requires> elements, the “lib” attribute specifies the widget library in question (currently the only supported value is “gtk”) and the “version” attribute specifies the target version in the form “<major>.<minor>”. The builder will error out if the version requirements are not met.
trans-unit.target: 最上层的元素是 <interface> 。它可以选择使用“ domain”属性，这将使构建器使用 dgettext() 在指定的域中查找转换后的字符串。也可以通过在构建器上调用 gtk_builder_set_translation_domain() 来完成此操作。对象由 <object> 元素描述，元素可以包含用于设置属性的<property>元素，将信号连接到处理程序的 <signal> 元素，以及描述子对象的 <child> 元素（通常是容器内的小部件，但也包含例如操作组中的操作，或树模型中的列）。甲 <child> 元素包含一个 <object> 描述子对象的元素。目标工具箱版本由<requires>元素描述，“ lib”属性指定相关的小部件库（当前唯一支持的值为“ gtk”），“ version”属性以以下形式指定目标版本“ <major> 。 <minor> ”。如果不满足版本要求，构建器将出错。

trans-unit.source: The use of this is best demonstrated through an example. In the following sample code we create two GtkTreeView widgets each with a view of the same data. As the model is wrapped here by a GtkTreeModelSort, the two GtkTreeViews can each sort their view of the data without affecting the other. By contrast, if we simply put the same model in each widget, then sorting the first would sort the second.
trans-unit.target: 通过一个例子可以最好地演示此用法。在下面的示例代码中，我们创建两个GtkTreeView小部件，每个小部件都具有相同的数据视图。由于模型是由GtkTreeModelSort包装的，因此两个GtkTreeView可以对数据视图进行排序，而不会影响彼此。相比之下，如果我们简单地将相同的模型放在每个小部件中，则对第一个进行排序将对第二个进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The window manager is in charge of rendering the frame or borders around windows; it also has final say on the size of each window, and window states such as minimized, maximized, and so forth. On Windows and MacOS the application handles most of this. On X11, if you wish to modify the window’s state, or change its frame, you must ask the window manager to do so on your behalf, using an established convention.
trans-unit.target: 窗口管理器负责渲染窗口周围的框架或边框。它还对每个窗口的大小以及窗口状态（例如最小化，最大化等）拥有最终决定权。在Windows和MacOS上，该应用程序可以处理大部分操作。在X11上，如果您想要修改窗口的状态或更改其框架，则必须使用已建立的约定，请窗口管理器代表您执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: The window manager is in charge of rendering the frame or borders around windows; it also has final say on the size of each window, and window states such as minimized, maximized, and so forth. On Windows and MacOS the application handles most of this. On X11, if you wish to modify the window’s state, or change its frame, you must ask the window manager to do so on your behalf, using an established convention.

trans-unit.source: Then build and install the GTK libraries in the order: GLib, Cairo, Pango, then GTK. For each library, follow the instructions they provide, and make sure to share common settings between them and the GTK build; if you are using a separate prefix for GTK, for instance, you will need to use the same prefix for all its dependencies you build. If you’re lucky, this will all go smoothly, and you’ll be ready to
trans-unit.target: 然后按以下顺序构建和安装GTK库：GLib，Cairo，Pango，然后是GTK。对于每个库，请按照它们提供的说明进行操作，并确保在它们与GTK内部版本之间共享通用设置。例如，如果您为GTK使用单独的前缀，则需要为您构建的所有依赖项使用相同的前缀。如果幸运的话，一切都会顺利进行，您将准备好

trans-unit.source: Then you start the print operation by calling gtk_print_operation_run(). It will then show a dialog, let the user select a printer and options. When the user finished the dialog various signals will be emitted on the GtkPrintOperation, the main one being “draw-page”, which you are supposed to catch and render the page on the provided GtkPrintContext using Cairo.
trans-unit.target: 然后，通过调用 gtk_print_operation_run() 开始打印操作。然后将显示一个对话框，让用户选择打印机和选项。当用户完成对话框时，各种信号将在GtkPrintOperation上发出，主要的信号是“ draw-page”，您应该使用Cairo在提供的GtkPrintContext上捕获并呈现页面。

trans-unit.source: Then, it "pastes" new room into the bitset by shifting all values larger than position by added spaces to the right. This frees up space that can then be filled.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它通过移位大于所有值“粘贴”的新房间到bitset position 通过 added 空格的权利。这样可以释放出可以填充的空间。

trans-unit.source: There are a few more environment variables that can be set to influence how the inspector renders its UI. GTK_INSPECTOR_DISPLAY and GTK_INSPECTOR_RENDERER determine the GDK display and the GSK renderer that the inspector is using.

trans-unit.target: GtkFileChooser API中有些东西无法与GtkFileChooserNative一起使用，因为这样的使用会禁止使用本机对话框。

trans-unit.source: There are a number of rules that must be followed when writing a new GtkCellRenderer. First and foremost, it’s important that a certain set of properties will always yield a cell renderer of the same size, barring a style change. The GtkCellRenderer also has a number of generic properties that are expected to be honored by all children.
trans-unit.target: 编写新的GtkCellRenderer时必须遵循许多规则。首先，很重要的一点是，除非更改样式，否则一定的属性集将始终产生相同大小的单元格渲染器。该GtkCellRenderer也有一些是预期由所有儿童兑现通用性。

trans-unit.source: There are also a lot of implicit triggers of these from the CSS layer (which does animations, resizes and repaints as needed).
trans-unit.target: 还有很多这些来自CSS层的隐性触发(根据需要做动画、调整大小和重绘)。

trans-unit.source: There are many configuration options for GtkNotebook. Among other things, you can choose on which edge the tabs appear (see gtk_notebook_set_tab_pos()), whether, if there are too many tabs to fit the notebook should be made bigger or scrolling arrows added (see gtk_notebook_set_scrollable()), and whether there will be a popup menu allowing the users to switch pages. (see gtk_notebook_popup_enable(), gtk_notebook_popup_disable())
trans-unit.target: GtkNotebook有许多配置选项。除其他事项外，您可以选择选项卡显示在哪条边缘上（请参阅 gtk_notebook_set_tab_pos() ），是否应该放大选项卡的数量，或者是否增加了滚动箭头（请参阅 gtk_notebook_set_scrollable() ），以及是否存在将是一个弹出菜单，允许用户切换页面。（请参阅 gtk_notebook_popup_enable() ， gtk_notebook_popup_disable() ）

trans-unit.source: There is quite a bit of flexibility provided to control the appearance of the GtkProgressBar. Functions are provided to control the orientation of the bar, optional text can be displayed along with the bar, and the step size used in activity mode can be set.

trans-unit.source: These functions must be called exactly once per proxy when the corresponding signal on the model is emitted. This single call updates all row references for that proxy. Since built-in GTK objects like GtkTreeView already use this mechanism internally, using them as the proxy object will produce unpredictable results. Further more, passing the same object as model and proxy doesn’t work for reasons of internal implementation.
trans-unit.target: 发出模型上的相应信号时，每个代理必须对这些函数进行一次精确调用。此单个调用将更新该代理的所有行引用。由于内置的​​GTK对象（例如GtkTreeView）已经在内部使用此机制，因此将它们用作代理对象将产生不可预测的结果。此外，由于内部实现的原因，传递与 model 和 proxy 相同的对象不起作用。

trans-unit.source: These identify the various errors that can occur while calling GtkFileChooser functions.
trans-unit.target: 这些标识了在调用GtkFileChooser函数时可能发生的各种错误。

trans-unit.source: These terms are used throughout the documentation when talking about lists and you should be aware of what they refer to. These are often generic terms that have a specific meaning in this context.

trans-unit.target: 这使区域可以告知其布局窗口小部件，是否希望以 GTK_SIZE_REQUEST_HEIGHT_FOR_WIDTH 或 GTK_SIZE_REQUEST_WIDTH_FOR_HEIGHT 模式进行分配。

trans-unit.source: This allows for a convenient way to handle activation in a columnview. See gtk_list_item_set_activatable() for details on how to use this signal.

trans-unit.target: 这允许一个方便的方法来处理网格视图中的激活。参见GtkListItem:activatable来了解如何使用这个信号。

trans-unit.source: This allows for a convenient way to handle activation in a listview. See gtk_list_item_set_activatable() for details on how to use this signal.
trans-unit.target: 这提供了一种方便的方式来处理列表视图中的激活。有关如何使用此信号的详细信息，请参见 gtk_list_item_set_activatable() 。

trans-unit.source: This amount of prebuffering can be displayed on the range’s trough and is themeable separately from the trough. To enable fill level display, use gtk_range_set_show_fill_level(). The range defaults to not showing the fill level.
trans-unit.target: 该预缓冲量可以显示在范围的波谷上，并且可以与波谷分开主题化。要启用填充水平显示，请使用 gtk_range_set_show_fill_level() 。范围默认为不显示填充水平。

trans-unit.source: This approach to handling radio buttons is different than many other action systems such as GtkAction. With GAction, there is only one action for “text-justify” and “left”, “center” and “right” are possible states on that action. There are not three separate “justify-left”, “justify-center” and “justify-right” actions.
trans-unit.target: 这种处理单选按钮的方法与许多其他动作系统（例如GtkAction）不同。使用GAction，只有一个动作可以“文本对齐”，并且“左”，“中心”和“右”是该动作的可能状态。没有三个单独的“左对齐”，“居中对齐”和“右对齐”动作。
